statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records;
SELECT record_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM vehicle_maintenance_records GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, SUM(maintenance_cost) AS total_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type IN ('Oil Change', 'Brake Service')
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM vehicle_maintenance_records GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING total_maintenance >= 3
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_date FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecord WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT id, maintenance_type FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecord WHERE vehicle_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, maintenance_type FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecord WHERE vehicle_id = 2 AND maintenance_type LIKE '%Inspection%';
SELECT id, make, year FROM Vehicle WHERE model = 'SUV';
SELECT make, model, year, last_maintenance_date FROM Vehicle ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT make, model, last_maintenance_date FROM Vehicle ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT v.make, m.maintenance_type, m.cost FROM Vehicle v JOIN Maintenance m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id;
SELECT m.name, m.specialization, COUNT(v.vehicle_id) FROM Mechanic m LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON m.mechanic_id = m.mechanic_id GROUP BY m.mechanic_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance WHERE cost > 500.00 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT Vehicle.make, COUNT(Maintenance.maintenance_id) AS total_maintenance FROM Vehicle JOIN Maintenance ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = Maintenance.vehicle_id GROUP BY Vehicle.make;
SELECT Mechanic.name, Maintenance.maintenance_type, Maintenance.cost FROM Mechanic INNER JOIN Maintenance ON Mechanic.mechanic_id = Maintenance.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_id, year, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model, year, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT record_id, maintenance_description, cost FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC, make, model;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' OR make = 'Honda';
SELECT v.*, m.name AS mechanic_name FROM vehicles v JOIN mechanics_assigned ma ON v.vehicle_id = ma.record_id JOIN mechanics m ON ma.mechanic_id = m.mechanic_id;
SELECT v.*, mr.maintenance_date, mr.maintenance_description, mr.cost FROM vehicles v JOIN maintenance_records mr ON v.vehicle_id = mr.vehicle_id WHERE mr.cost > 500 ORDER BY mr.cost DESC;
SELECT make, model, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicles GROUP BY make, model ORDER BY total_vehicles DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT mechanic_name, specialty FROM mechanics WHERE specialty IN ('Electrical', 'Engine');
SELECT part_name, quantity, unit_price FROM parts_inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, cost FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT mechanic_name, specialty FROM mechanics WHERE specialty LIKE '%Engine%';
SELECT part_name, quantity, unit_price FROM parts_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
